name: Memory lost in the (Red) W(h)ood(y)
description:
Game Jam info
  • Name: Global Game Jam
  • Theme: Lost & Found
  • Diversifiers completed: 
    • On the safe side - Make a game alone or in a team where all members are at least 100km apart.
Story

Rose, wants to visit her Grandma after a long period of COV-19 where everybody was locked down for several weeks.

But as soon as she tries to open the door, the old person doesn't want to hear a word and won’t open the door to strangers.
Without any option left, Rose is really confused. But this talking cat seems to have a solution..

Discover the environment to find what the cat is asking for, hoping to see your grandma again.

Instructions

Observe, Think and interact with your mouse to solve this beautiful and relaxing game.

  • Move: Click on the ground
  • Interact: Click on the object
  • Talk: Click on the character.
Team

- André Sousa  : Sound Designer.
- Noémie Bézier : 2D Artist.
- Grégoire Boiron (GrayGzou) : Developer.
- Guillaume Laurent (guillaumelau) : Game / Level Designer.
- Marc Moussiegt : Narrative designer
